Current Company: Disney+ Hotstar

Right now I don't have any other offers. Current offer I have received after 5 months once there was an opening.

Do you think it's a good offer given the current market situation? I am yet to have another discussion with recruiter. Let me how can I negotiate better.

title: AppViewX | Engineer - Software Development 2 | On-Campus
